item.title: Tainted Grail: The Fall of Avalon sales top one million
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

PC version on sale for a limited time.

Total sales for action RPG Tainted Grail: The Fall of Avalon have surpassed one million units, publisher Awaken Realms and developer Awaken Realms Digital announced.

Tainted Grail: The Fall of Avalon first launched in Early Access for PC via Steam on March 30, 2023, followed by a full release across PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC on May 23, 2025. The expansion “Sanctuary of Sarras” launched on December 15, 2025.

To celebrate the milestone, the Steam versions of both the base game and expansion are currently available at a 20 percent-off discount price for a limited time.

Watch a new trailer below.

One Million Copies Sold



https://www.gematsu.com/2026/01/tainted-grail-the-fall-of-avalon-sales-top-one-million

item.title: 33 Immortals coming to Steam this summer
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Currently available via Epic Games Store and Microsoft Store.

Thunder Lotus Games will release the PC version of cooperative roguelike action game 33 Immortals via Steam this summer, the developer announced.

33 Immortals first launched in Early Access for Xbox Series and PC via Epic Games Store and Microsoft Store on March 18, 2024. It is also available via Game Pass.

It is currently unclear whether the game will still be in Early Access when it launches via Steam.

“Bringing 33 Immortals to Steam is an important milestone for us,” said creative director Stephan Logier in a press release. “The game has grown a lot through our first five updates, and we’re excited to keep building it with even more players joining the rebellion.”

Here is an overview of the game, via Thunder Lotus Games:

First released into Early Access in March on Epic Games Store and Xbox, the game has steadily evolved alongside its community, surpassing one million players since launch. The Steam release will deliver the most up-to-date version of 33 Immortals and mark the next step in the game’s ongoing journey following multiple content updates and improvements since launch.

Since its Early Access debut, 33 Immortals has continued to expand and improve through five major updates. These updates introduced new content and refinement across the experience, including additional gameplay features and quality-of-life improvements, all of which will be included in the Steam version.

Watch a new trailer below.

Steam Announce Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2026/01/33-immortals-coming-to-steam-this-summer

item.title: Life is Strange: Reunion announced for PS5, Xbox Series, and PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Due out on March 26.

Publisher Square Enix and developer Deck Nine Games have announced Life is Strange: Reunion for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC (Steam, Microsoft Store). It will launch on March 26.

Pre-orders are now available in the following editions:

  • Standard Edition ($39.99 / £44.99 / €49.99 / ¥7,480)
    • A copy of the game
    • Pre-order bonus: Max and Chloe Classic Outfits
  • Deluxe Edition ($49.99 / £54.99 / €59.99 / ¥8,250)
    • A copy of the game
    • Pre-order bonus: Max and Chloe Classic Outfits
    • Digital mini soundtrack
    • Digital art book
    • Digital comic
    • Exclusive behind the scenes documentary with Hannah Telle and Rhianna DeVries
  • Twin Pack ($59.99 / £49.99 / €69.99 / ¥8,580)
    • A copy of Life is Strange: Reunion standard edition
    • A copy of Life is Strange: Double Exposure standard edition
    • Pre-order bonus: Max and Chloe Classic Outfits
  • Collector’s Edition ($99.99, Square Enix Store-exclusive)
    • A copy of the game
    • Collector’s goods box and sleeve with exclusive artwork by Ilya Kuvshinov
    • 12-inch vinyl soundtrack featuring 12 amazing songs from the game on an orange 12-inch EcoRecord vinyl
    • Double-sided Drugstore Makeup 24 inches by 12 inches poster
    • Rewind symbol felt slipmat
    • Custom double-sided guitar plectrums with six unique designs (x3)
    • Polaroid art cards celebrating Max and Chloe (x3)
  • ❮
  • ❯

Here is an overview of the game, via Square Enix:

About

Chloe Price was Max Caulfield’s partner in time… Losing her is Max’s greatest regret.

Now Chloe has come to Caledon University. Haunted by nightmares and impossible memories, Chloe needs Max’s help.

But Max is already in crisis: in three days, a deadly inferno will destroy the campus.

Max’s Rewind power has bought her time—but she can’t prevent the blaze alone.

The fire will force Max and Chloe to make devastating decisions. Can they find a future together… Before everything burns?

Key Features

  • An Epic Finale – The saga of Max and Chloe, and the fate of Caledon, is yours to decide! Play as both Max and Chloe as an all-new story builds towards an epic climax.
  • Rewind Returns – Max’s iconic power is back! Undo and redo every decision, change the course of conversations, and manipulate your environment to solve four-dimensional puzzles.
  • Playable Punk – As the Backtalk-wielding Chloe, you’ll rely on your wits, guile, and barbed put-downs as you race to unravel the secrets of her nightmares and double memories.
  • Life, Death, and Consequences – No one is safe from the coming blaze: identify the culprits before your friends at Caledon meet their fiery demise. Who will survive? That’s down to you!
  • Exclusive Soundtrack – A rich original score and songs, and licensed tracks both nostalgic and new.

Watch the announcement trailer and reveal event below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

Announce Trailer

Reveal Live Stream



https://www.gematsu.com/2026/01/life-is-strange-reunion-announced-for-ps5-xbox-series-and-pc
